docs.snippet: The Canadian dollar was steady last week, hovering around the best levels of the movement which started an upward spiral beginning about six weeks ago. However, these "peak" values caused a falling off in the buying and a modest decline (1/16 cent)...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian dollar was steady last week, hovering around the best levels of the movement which started an upward spiral beginning about six weeks ago. However, these "peak" values caused a falling off in the buying and a modest decline (1/16 cent) at the closing price of 90.12 cents. The week's highest of 90.25 cents was made on Wednesday and Thursday, add the lowest, 89.94 cents, on Friday.

docs.snippet: The Institute of International Education, 2 West Forty-fifth Street, announced yesterday the award of seventeen grants for research at universities and libraries in Latin America this year. The institute, of which Dr. Stephen Duggan is director, said...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Institute of International Education, 2 West Forty-fifth Street, announced yesterday the award of seventeen grants for research at universities and libraries in Latin America this year. The institute, of which Dr. Stephen Duggan is director, said the appointments were made on the recommendation of a prominent group of American educators interested in the other American republics.

docs.snippet: Times have changed considerably. The ardent swain of yester-year purchased three, maybe five, pounds of rich candies snugly set amid foil and lace in a quilted satin heart, and in addition, a fat milk chocolate heart inscribed in bas relief, "To my...
docs.lead_paragraph: Times have changed considerably. The ardent swain of yester-year purchased three, maybe five, pounds of rich candies snugly set amid foil and lace in a quilted satin heart, and in addition, a fat milk chocolate heart inscribed in bas relief, "To my valentine." So armed, he considered himself well equipped to meet the day at hand.

headline.main: News of Food; Valentine Loses Her Chocolate Heart, But There Are Goodies to Console Her

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 12 -- Eric A. Johnston, president of the Chamber of Commerce of the United States, left today for a tour of six South American countries emphasizing the importance to this country of economic development in Latin America.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 12 -- Eric A. Johnston, president of the Chamber of Commerce of the United States, left today for a tour of six South American countries emphasizing the importance to this country of economic development in Latin America.
